title: Matrix Multiplication Quiz
description: Test your understanding of matrix multiplication and its properties.

questions.question: For matrices A (m×n) and B (n×p) to be multiplied, what must be true?
options: Columns of A = rows of B
questions.explanation: The number of columns in A must equal the number of rows in B.

questions.question: What are the dimensions of the product of a 2×3 matrix and a 3×4 matrix?
Which property does matrix multiplication have?
questions.explanation: Matrix multiplication is associative but not commutative.

questions.question: What is the element in position (1,1) of the product [1 2; 3 4] × [5 6; 7 8]?
When is AB = BA for matrices A and B?
options: When A and B are square matrices
questions.explanation: AB = BA only when the matrices commute, which is not guaranteed.
